description: This table contains hospital account statement history information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple statements and detail bills can be sent for one hospital account, each statement or detail bill will have a unique line number. Note: This table includes information on demand statements and detail bills. Detail bills are sent at the hospital account level. Statements can be sent at the guarantor or hospital account level. When statements are sent at the guarantor level, a statement entry is made for each hospital account for which the guarantor is responsible.

columns.name: STMT_HX_DATE
columns.description: The date on which a statement or detail bill was sent.

columns.name: TOTAL_PAYMENTS
columns.description: The total payments that appeared on a statement or detail bill.

columns.name: NEW_PAYMENTS
columns.description: The total new payments that appeared on a statement. This column does not apply to detail bills.

columns.name: TOTAL_ADJUSTMENTS
columns.description: The total adjustments that appeared on a statement or detail bill.

columns.name: TOTAL_DUE
columns.description: The total due that appeared on a statement or detail bill.

columns.description:

columns.name: TOTAL_BALANCE

columns.name: PREV_INS_BAL
